contextual_notes: The user consistently used 'Hmmmm...' which may indicate uncertainty or contemplation, affecting satisfaction scores.
The conversation's focus was narrow, primarily on finding groceries, which might limit the scope of satisfaction.
general_insights: Providing clear, relevant, and timely information can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Monitoring user feedback closely allows for adjustments to improve the interaction quality.
Understanding subtle cues in user language can help tailor responses more effectively.
